BASIC_INFO.TITLE: Basic Information

CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change Password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Choose a strong password that you don't use elsewhere. We'll send you a confirmation email after your password is changed.

SECURITY_TIPS.TITLE: Security Tips
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_1: Use a unique password that you haven't used for other accounts
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_2: Include a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_3: Consider enabling two-factor authentication for enhanced security
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_4: Regularly review your login activity and active sessions

CHANGE_PASSWORD_FORM.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.

VALIDATION.MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
VALIDATION.UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
VALIDATION.LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
VALIDATION.NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character

ERRORS.SAME_PASSWORD: New password must be different from current password
ERRORS.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred while updating your password. Please try again.

help.HERO_SUBTITLE: The most complete directory boilerplate, enhanced with AI and packed with all the essential features: listings, payments, submissions, CMS, blog, authentication, newsletter, SEO, themes, and more.
help.HERO_FEATURE_1_DESC: Streamlined content organization and automated workflows
help.HERO_FEATURE_2_DESC: Modern, responsive layouts that convert visitors
help.HERO_FEATURE_3_DESC: Fitur monetisasi bawaan untuk pertumbuhan berkelanjutan
help.HERO_DEMO_DESCRIPTION: Experience the power of modern directory solutions
help.HERO_SPECIAL_OFFER: ðŸ”¥ Limited Time: Free Premium Templates
help.HERO_SUBTITLE_FEATURES: and everything you need to build a successful directory platform.

help.HOW_IT_WORKS_STEP3_DESC: Deploy your directory platform and start accepting submissions from users
help.MONETIZATION_AFFILIATION_DESC: Dapatkan komisi dengan mempromosikan produk dan layanan yang relevan kepada pengunjung direktori Anda
help.MONETIZATION_PAID_SUBMISSION_DESC: Kenakan biaya untuk daftar direktori premium dengan visibilitas yang lebih baik dan penempatan unggulan
help.MONETIZATION_SPONSORED_ADS_DESC: Tampilkan iklan tertarget dan dapatkan pendapatan dari sponsor dan pengiklan
help.MONETIZATION_SECTION_SUBTITLE: Berbagai sumber pendapatan bawaan untuk membantu Anda menghasilkan uang dari direktori sejak hari pertama
help.INSTALLATION_STEP1_DESC: Start by cloning the Ever Works open-source directory builder repository from GitHub to your local machine
help.INSTALLATION_STEP2_DESC: Install all required packages and dependencies for your directory platform
help.INSTALLATION_STEP3_DESC: Set up your environment variables and database configuration
help.INSTALLATION_STEP4_DESC: Configure your Supabase database and run migrations

help.USAGE_MANAGING_CATEGORIES_DESC: Organize your directory with custom categories and tags
help.USAGE_CUSTOMIZING_THEMES_DESC: Personalize your directory's appearance with custom themes and layouts
help.USAGE_SETTING_UP_PAYMENTS_DESC: Konfigurasi pemrosesan pembayaran untuk daftar premium dan monetisasi

help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_2_DESC: Follow security guidelines to protect user data and maintain trust
help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_3_DESC: Implement caching, lazy loading, and other performance optimizations for better user experience

help.USAGE_CUSTOMIZING_DESIGN_DESC: Learn how to customize themes, layouts, and visual elements of your directory
help.USAGE_MANAGING_USERS_DESC: Handle user authentication, roles, and permissions in your directory platform
help.USAGE_PAYMENTS_SETUP_DESC: Configure Stripe integration and payment processing for premium listings
help.USAGE_DEPLOYMENT_DESC: Deploy your directory to production with Vercel, Netlify, or other platforms
help.USAGE_GUIDE_SUBTITLE: Master your directory platform with comprehensive tutorials and best practices
help.DOCUMENTATION_DESC: Comprehensive guides and API reference for building directories
help.DOCS_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Interactive API documentation for the Ever Works website template
help.COMMUNITY_DESC: Join our Discord community for support and discussions
help.EMAIL_SUPPORT_DESC: Get personalized help from our directory experts
help.CONTACT_SUPPORT_DESC: Get direct help from our support team via email
help.NEED_HELP_DESC: We're here to help you build and grow your directory platform. Choose the support option that works best for you.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP1_DESC: Set up the foundation of your directory platform with our starter template
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP2_DESC: Personalize your directory with themes, categories, and custom settings
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP3_DESC: Populate your directory with items and deploy to production
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP4_DESC: Deploy your directory to production and optimize for performance and security
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_DESC: Follow our proven methodology to create a successful directory platform
help.TECH_NEXTJS_DESC: React framework for building directory platforms with server-side rendering
help.TECH_TYPESCRIPT_DESC: Type-safe JavaScript for building robust directory applications
help.TECH_TAILWIND_DESC: Utility-first CSS framework for styling your directory interface
help.TECH_SUPABASE_DESC: Open-source backend for directory data storage and authentication - perfectly integrated with our GitHub-native approach
help.BENEFITS_FAST_DESC: Get your directory platform running in under 10 minutes
help.BENEFITS_SECURE_DESC: Built-in security best practices and authentication for directories
help.BENEFITS_MOBILE_DESC: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices
help.BENEFITS_CUSTOMIZABLE_DESC: Easy to customize with themes, layouts, and directory-specific features
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: Build Your Directory in 3 Simple Steps
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_DESCRIPTION: Follow our streamlined process to create a professional directory platform that's ready to accept submissions and generate revenue.
help.TECH_STACK_SUBTITLE: Industry-standard technologies optimized for building scalable directory platforms
help.ENV_CONFIG_DESC: Set up the essential environment variables needed to run your directory platform securely and efficiently
help.ENV_CONFIG_LOCAL_DEV_DESC: Set up your local development environment
help.ENV_CONFIG_NEED_HELP_DESC: Our support team is here to help you configure your directory platform correctly
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME: How long does it take to build a directory?
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME_ANSWER: With our directory builder, you can have a professional directory running in under 10 minutes.
help.FAQ_CODING_EXPERIENCE_ANSWER: No coding required! Our open-source, AI-powered directory builder makes it easy for anyone to create professional directories. Free template, GitHub-native, SaaS optional.
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN: Can I customize my directory design?
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN_ANSWER: Yes! Ever Works offers extensive customization options with multiple themes and layouts for your directory.
help.FAQ_HOSTING: Where can I host my directory?
help.FAQ_HOSTING_ANSWER: We recommend Vercel for the best performance, but your directory works with any Node.js hosting provider.
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION: How do I integrate payment processing?
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION_ANSWER: Our directory platform comes with pre-configured Stripe integration. Simply add your API keys in the environment variables and the payment system will be ready for premium listings.
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN: Can I use my own domain?
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_ANSWER: Yes! You can easily connect your custom domain to your directory. We provide step-by-step instructions for domain configuration with popular providers.
help.QUICK_START_DESC: Get your directory platform up and running quickly
help.ENV_SETUP_DESC: Configure your environment variables and API keys

help.SUPPORT_DESC: Get help and find answers to common questions
help.JOIN_DEVELOPERS_DESC: Join thousands of developers who are already building amazing directory platforms with our open-source, AI-powered builder. Free template. GitHub-native. SaaS optional.

help.START_MONETIZING_DESC: Pilih strategi monetisasi yang paling sesuai dengan platform direktori Anda dan mulai menghasilkan pendapatan segera.

AUTH_FORM.ADMIN_WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Silakan masuk dengan kredensial admin Anda untuk mengakses bagian manajemen.

CREDENTIALS_FORM.ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: Tidak ada akun yang ditemukan dengan alamat email ini. Silakan periksa email Anda atau buat akun baru.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.INVALID_PASSWORD: Kata sandi tidak valid. Silakan periksa kata sandi Anda dan coba lagi.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.PROFILE_NOT_FOUND: Profil akun tidak ditemukan. Silakan hubungi dukungan.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.RATE_LIMITED: Terlalu banyak percobaan. Silakan tunggu beberapa menit sebelum mencoba lagi.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.USE_OAUTH_PROVIDER: Akun ini menggunakan login sosial. Silakan masuk dengan Google atau GitHub.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Lupa Kata Sandi?
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Jangan khawatir! Masukkan alamat email Anda dan kami akan mengirimkan tautan reset.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Kami telah mengirimkan tautan reset kata sandi ke alamat email Anda. Silakan periksa kotak masuk Anda dan ikuti instruksi untuk mengatur ulang kata sandi.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUCCESS_NOTE: Jika Anda tidak melihat email di kotak masuk, silakan periksa folder spam Anda.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Kami tidak dapat mengirim email pengaturan ulang.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.INVALID_EMAIL: Silakan masukkan alamat email yang valid

NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Tetapkan Kata Sandi Baru

NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.ADVANCED_ENCRYPTION: Enkripsi tingkat lanjut untuk keamanan Anda
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.LINK_EXPIRED: Tautan pengaturan ulang kata sandi ini telah kedaluwarsa atau tidak valid
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.PASSWORD_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Kata sandi Anda telah berhasil diperbarui.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.ACCOUNT_SECURE_MESSAGE: Akun Anda sekarang aman dengan kata sandi baru Anda.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.CHOOSE_STRONGER_PASSWORD: Silakan pilih kata sandi yang lebih kuat
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.ERROR_VERIFYING_TOKEN: Terjadi kesalahan saat memverifikasi token reset

EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.TITLE: Verifikasi Email
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Memverifikasi email Anda membantu kami mengamankan akun Anda dan terus memberi Anda informasi tentang pembaruan penting.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.GET_ACCESS_FEATURES: Dapatkan akses ke semua fitur setelah diverifikasi
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.PLEASE_WAIT: Harap tunggu sementara kami memverifikasi alamat email Anda...
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.VERIFICATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: Ada masalah saat memverifikasi email Anda.

pages.ABOUT_PAGE_META_DESCRIPTION: Pelajari tentang layanan direktori kami dan misi kami untuk menghubungkan orang-orang dengan sumber daya yang berharga
pages.PRIVACY_POLICY_META_DESCRIPTION: Pelajari bagaimana direktori kami mengumpulkan, menggunakan, dan melindungi informasi Anda
pages.TERMS_OF_SERVICE_META_DESCRIPTION: Syarat dan ketentuan untuk menggunakan layanan direktori kami
pages.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang perusahaan kami
pages.PRIVACY_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Pelajari cara kami melindungi data Anda
pages.COOKIES_META_DESCRIPTION: Informasi tentang cara kami menggunakan cookie dan teknologi serupa di situs web kami

sponsor.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Tampilkan produk Anda di depan ribuan pengunjung dengan penempatan [IKLAN] yang menonjol di setiap halaman.
sponsor.BENEFIT_VISIBILITY_DESCRIPTION: Produk Anda ditampilkan secara mencolok di beranda dan semua halaman daftar.
sponsor.BENEFIT_TRAFFIC_DESCRIPTION: Jangkau setiap pengunjung dengan visibilitas lencana [IKLAN] di seluruh situs.
sponsor.BENEFIT_BADGE_DESCRIPTION: Dapatkan dukungan khusus dan persetujuan cepat.
sponsor.NO_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION: Anda perlu mengirimkan item terlebih dahulu sebelum dapat mensponsorinya.
sponsor.SELECT_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Pilih dari item yang telah Anda kirimkan untuk disponsori.
sponsor.NO_ITEMS_FOUND: Tidak ada item yang cocok dengan pencarian Anda.
sponsor.SELECT_DURATION_DESCRIPTION: Pilih berapa lama Anda ingin mensponsori item Anda.
sponsor.APPROVAL_NOTICE: Sponsor Anda akan ditinjau oleh tim kami sebelum tayang. Anda akan diberi tahu setelah disetujui.
sponsor.SELECT_ITEM_TO_CONTINUE: Pilih item dan durasi untuk melanjutkan.
sponsor.SUBMIT_SUCCESS: Sponsor berhasil dikirim! Anda akan diberi tahu setelah disetujui.
sponsor.SUBMIT_ERROR: Gagal mengirim sponsor. Silakan coba lagi.

submissions.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Lacak dan kelola pengiriman direktori Anda.
submissions.EMPTY_STATE_DESC: Mulailah membangun portofolio Anda dengan mengirimkan proyek pertama Anda.
submissions.ANALYTICS_DESC: Lacak kinerja pengiriman Anda, tingkat persetujuan, dan metrik keterlibatan komunitas setelah Anda mulai mengirimkan.
submissions.START_JOURNEY_DESC: Setelah Anda mengirimkan proyek pertama Anda, Anda akan melihat rincian status pengiriman Anda di sini.
submissions.ERROR_DESC: Kami mengalami kesalahan saat memuat kiriman Anda.
submissions.DELETE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: This will hide your submission. You can restore it later.
submissions.EDIT_STATUS_WARNING: Pengeditan item yang disetujui memerlukan persetujuan ulang
submissions.SUCCESS_DELETED: Pengajuan dihapus dan dipindahkan ke tempat sampah
submissions.TRASH_DESCRIPTION: Item yang dihapus. Anda dapat memulihkannya kapan saja.
submissions.TRASH_EMPTY_DESC: Pengajuan yang dihapus akan muncul di sini. Ketika Anda menghapus pengajuan, Anda dapat memulihkannya dari halaman ini.
submissions.NO_SUBMISSIONS_DESC: Mulai bangun portofolio Anda dengan mengajukan proyek pertama Anda.
submissions.DELETE_CONFIRM_ITEM: Ini akan memindahkan "{title}" ke tempat sampah. Anda dapat memulihkannya nanti.
submissions.RESTORE_INFO: Anda dapat memulihkan item ini dari tempat sampah kapan saja.
submissions.TAGS_CANNOT_EDIT: Tag tidak dapat diedit saat ini.
submissions.SOFT_DELETE_DESC: Kiriman Anda akan disembunyikan dari pandangan publik tetapi tidak dihapus secara permanen.
submissions.SUBMISSIONS_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Lacak dan kelola pengiriman direktori Anda.

dashboard.TITLE: Dasbor
dashboard.WELCOME_BACK: Selamat datang kembali, {name}! Berikut ringkasan aktivitas Anda.

sponsorships.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Lacak dan kelola pengiriman iklan sponsor Anda.
sponsorships.EMPTY_STATE_DESC: Tingkatkan visibilitas proyek Anda dengan membuat sponsor.
sponsorships.CONFIRM_CANCEL_MESSAGE: Apakah Anda yakin ingin membatalkan sponsorship ini?

sponsorships.RENEW_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Perluas sponsor Anda untuk terus menampilkan item Anda secara menonjol di direktori.
sponsorships.RENEW_REDIRECT_INFO: Anda akan diarahkan ke penyedia pembayaran kami untuk menyelesaikan perpanjangan.
